chat.chatBot: Hello Participant! Type START to begin this activity
Can you describe the problem from someone's point of view who was not involved in it?
How do you describe this problem?
How does the other person describe it?
Why do you see the problem that way?
Why does the other person see the problem that way?
What/How do you feel about it?
What kind of thoughts did you have about it?
Thank you for your response, type END to end survey
